backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor module with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing logo theming update and related frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base, components, and utilities imports.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all main routes and renders RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/branding/UtthanL: Themed logo component rendering a styled div placeholder for the clinic logo.
frontend/src/components/contact/GoogleMa: Embeds Google Maps iframe showing clinic location with responsive container.
frontend/src/components/cta/BookAppointm: Button linking to the clinic's Calendly booking URL with Calendar icon.
Email button generating a mailto link using clinic email and optional subject/body.
frontend/src/components/cta/MobileSticky: Mobile-only fixed bottom booking CTA linking to Calendly.
frontend/src/components/home/WhoWeAreSec: Home page section showing clinic intro, doctor info, and link to full story.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with clinic info, quick links, services list, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, mobile menu, and booking button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapping header, footer, and main outlet.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Sets document title, meta description, and optional JSON-LD schema.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Renders a service card with image fallback, icon, summary text, and a link to the service page.
Maps service IDs to Lucide icons and returns the appropriate icon component.
frontend/src/content/clinicContent.ts: Provides static clinic content including hero text, about section, values, and reasons to choose the clinic.
frontend/src/content/conditions.ts: Defines condition types and a list of conditions with symptoms and treatments.
frontend/src/content/faq.ts: Contains FAQ entries with questions and answers for patient guidance.
frontend/src/content/reviews.ts: Includes review data, Google rating metadata, and helper functions for calculating averages.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines service types and detailed service entries with descriptions, benefits, and images.
frontend/src/content/therapists.ts: Provides therapist profiles including qualifications, specialties, experience, and bios.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for theming, plus utility classes for UI effects and logo styling.
frontend/src/lib/clinicInfo.ts: Exports clinic contact and address info with helpers to format the full address and phone link.
frontend/src/lib/seoSchema.ts: Generates JSON‑LD schema objects for local business, services, FAQs, and reviews using clinic data.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a `cn` helper to merge Tailwind and class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the clinic's About page with hero, story, mission, vision, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ConditionsPage.tsx: Displays a list of treatable conditions with descriptions, symptoms, treatments, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows the clinic's contact details, actions, map embed, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Renders the FAQ page with SEO metadata and an accordion listing FAQ items.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the homepage with a hero section, trust badges, services, and clinic highlights using SEO data.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed service information including images, benefits, and SEO schema based on the selected service.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of all services with a hero section and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Renders a testimonials page with patient reviews, star ratings, and a link to Google reviews.
frontend/src/pages/TherapistsPage.tsx: Displays a team page with therapist profiles, qualifications, and specializations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, typography, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks homepage redesign progress, brand‑palette enforcement, asset replacements, and required UI/content fixes for the clinic site. Lists architectural constraints, canonical business details, and known issues like missing images, incorrect colors, and broken hero layout.
